title: Workshop Bibliography

title: Specialized Data Curation Workshops @ NIH
text: As part of the continuation of the IMLS funded project “Developing Specialized Data Curation Training to Address Needed Expertise in Focused Areas”, the Data Curation Network is partnering with the National Institutes of Health to offer a series of data curation workshops on specialized topics.

title: Specialized Data Curation Workshops @ NIH
text:
Schedule






Warning



The workshop schedule is still being developed and may change!



Code & Simulation Data

Date: May 12-13, 2025

Location: NIH Campus (Bethesda, MD)
Instructors: Seth Erickson and Greg Janée (Code); Wanda Marsolek and L. Wynholds (Simulation Data)


Day 1: May 12th







Time
Topic




9:00 AM
Welcome and DCN background and Icebreaker (w/breakfast)


9:30 AM
Computing platforms and programing languages


10:30 AM
Break


10:45 PM
Dependencies and Documentation


12:00 PM
Lunch


1:00 PM
Licensing and project structure


2:30 PM
Break


3:00 PM
Simulation Data Introduction


4:00 PM
End of Day 1


6:00 - 7:30 PM
Dine Arounds!

Time
Topic




9:00 AM
Welcome Back & Recap from Day 1
